QuestData.Title: Got Some Flotsam?
QuestData.Description: We can figure this out, $n. We just need some Dwarven ingenuity. Think, Groffy, think!$B$BThese murlocs are just looking for a home, right? Let's do something constructive. I mean that literally.$B$BAll sorts of debris was washed ashore during the catastrophe, and some of the decimated murloc hovels may still be salvageable. Run along the shore here and gather up any building materials fit for a murloc. That's an admittedly low standard.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 5 pieces of Salvageable Greymist Wreckage from along the shore and in the water near the Remtravel Excavation.
QuestData.RewardText: <Archaeologist Groff picks through the wreckage.>$B$BWell, not much here that don't look stepped on, sat on, or soaked in a toilet. But toss some thatch on top and it'll do.$B$BTell me, $n, do you consider yourself an architect?
